44-2620.Nonresident consultant; personal jurisdiction.

Obtaining a nonresident license shall constitute sufficient contact with this state for the exercise of personal jurisdiction over such a person in any action, suit, or proceeding instituted by or on behalf of any interested person arising out of the applicant's consulting business in Nebraska.

SourceLaws 1980, LB 481, ยง 15;Laws 1983, LB 447, ยง 66.
